languages.text: "Проповедники хулы и скверны выискивают сердца и умы послабее, дабы заронить туда семена ереси. Будем молиться о том, что во владениях фон Валанциус более не найдется таковых".
"Preachers of blasphemy and corruption seek out weak hearts and minds in which to sow the seeds of heresy. Let us pray that there is no such fertile ground remaining in the von Valancius holdings."
languages.original_text: "Проповедники хулы и скверны выискивают сердца и умы послабее, дабы заронить туда семена ереси. Будем молиться о том, что во владениях фон Валанциус более не найдется таковых".

languages.text: “亵渎与腐化的布道士会寻找软弱的心灵与思想，在其中播下异端的种子。让我们祈祷，冯·瓦兰修斯的领地中再也不会有这样的温床了。”
languages.original_text: "Preachers of blasphemy and corruption seek out weak hearts and minds in which to sow the seeds of heresy. Let us pray that there is no such fertile ground remaining in the von Valancius holdings."

traits.locale_text: “亵渎与腐化的布道士会寻找软弱的心灵与思想，在其中播下异端的种子。让我们祈祷，冯·瓦兰修斯的领地中再也不会有这样的温床了。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Les prêcheurs de blasphème et de corruption cherchent toujours à semer leurs graines dans les esprits et les cœurs les plus faibles. Prions qu'il n'y ait pas d'autre terrain aussi fertile dans le domaine des von Valancius. »
languages.original_text: "Preachers of blasphemy and corruption seek out weak hearts and minds in which to sow the seeds of heresy. Let us pray that there is no such fertile ground remaining in the von Valancius holdings."

traits.locale_text: « Les prêcheurs de blasphème et de corruption cherchent toujours à semer leurs graines dans les esprits et les cœurs les plus faibles. Prions qu'il n'y ait pas d'autre terrain aussi fertile dans le domaine des von Valancius. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Los predicadores de blasfemias y corrupción buscan corazones y mentes débiles para sembrar la simiente de la herejía. Esperemos que no les quede más tierra fértil en el terreno de la casa von Valancius».
languages.original_text: "Preachers of blasphemy and corruption seek out weak hearts and minds in which to sow the seeds of heresy. Let us pray that there is no such fertile ground remaining in the von Valancius holdings."

traits.locale_text: «Los predicadores de blasfemias y corrupción buscan corazones y mentes débiles para sembrar la simiente de la herejía. Esperemos que no les quede más tierra fértil en el terreno de la casa von Valancius».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「神を冒涜し、堕落したプリーチャーは異端の種をまくために弱い心を探し求める。フォン・ヴァランシウスの領内に異端がはびこるほどの土壌がないことを祈ろう」
languages.original_text: "Preachers of blasphemy and corruption seek out weak hearts and minds in which to sow the seeds of heresy. Let us pray that there is no such fertile ground remaining in the von Valancius holdings."

traits.locale_text: 「神を冒涜し、堕落したプリーチャーは異端の種をまくために弱い心を探し求める。フォン・ヴァランシウスの領内に異端がはびこるほどの土壌がないことを祈ろう」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Prediger der Blasphemie und Korruption zielen auf jene mit schwachem Herzen und schwachem Verstand ab, um darin die Saat der Ketzerei zu säen. Beten wir, dass es in den Besitztümern der Dynastie von Valancius keinen solch fruchtbaren Boden mehr gibt."
languages.original_text: "Preachers of blasphemy and corruption seek out weak hearts and minds in which to sow the seeds of heresy. Let us pray that there is no such fertile ground remaining in the von Valancius holdings."

languages.original_text: "Preachers of blasphemy and corruption seek out weak hearts and minds in which to sow the seeds of heresy. Let us pray that there is no such fertile ground remaining in the von Valancius holdings."

languages.text: "Dine aykırılık ve yozluk vaizleri, kâfirlik tohumları ekmek için zayıf kalpler ve zihinler arar. Dua edelim de von Valancius topraklarında böylesine verimli sonuçlar elde edebilecekleri başka yerler olmasın."
languages.original_text: "Preachers of blasphemy and corruption seek out weak hearts and minds in which to sow the seeds of heresy. Let us pray that there is no such fertile ground remaining in the von Valancius holdings."

traits.locale_text: "Günah ve yozluk vaizleri, kâfirlik tohumları ekmek için zayıf kalpler ve zihinler arar. Dua edelim de von Valancius topraklarında böylesine verimli sonuçlar elde edebilecekleri başka yerler olmasın."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
